00155             inline SphericEmitter* SphericEmitter::create(const Vector3D& direction,float angleA,float angleB)
00156             {
00157                         SphericEmitter* obj = new SphericEmitter(direction,angleA,angleB);
00158                         registerObject(obj);
00159                         return obj;
00160             }
